about_the_game:
Ventreville: A Cure for Sorrow is a fantasy visual novel game with a colorful cast of playable characters, each with their own unique mechanics, and all of whom are necessary in solving this mystery. But be careful, as your choices will determine whether their stories end in ruin or victory.

Start as Orven Zanry, an up-and-coming glassblower working for the esteemed Ret Avidine. Work to uncover the secrets of “Remedium,” the cure to the plague destroying the city of Ventreville. And as you learn more about the remedy, your hero, and your coworkers, realize that things are not as they seem…

Key Features
  • Choices with Consequences: Choose how you play Orven, and see the characters shift based on your choices
  • Butterfly Effect: Determine the fate of Ventreville and its inhabitants with branching routes, some silly and some dire
  • Replay to find all the unique endings
  • More than 75k words for 2.5 hours of gameplay per playthrough
  • Enjoy the stylish character designs
  • Live in Ventreville through the expressive backgrounds
  • Hear the city through an original soundtrack
  • First chapter of a six-chapter game

content_descriptors.notes: There is one scene that involves death, which has depictions of blood.  There is another scene that involves a bloodied character.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 (Compatibility)
  • Processor: x86_64 or ARM CPU (Apple Silicon)
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 Catalina
  • Processor: x86_64 or ARM CPU (Apple Silicon)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, or any x86_64 CPU
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full OpenGL 4.6 support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Determine the fate of Ventreville, a city plagued by sickness and secrets. Play as six protagonists with unique abilities as you interrogate and outwit suspects, hide from enemies, crack puzzles, and even call the Gods for help! What are you willing to risk to find the truth?
